entry.title: Russian and Ukrainian Forces Prepare for Next Phase of Battle for Donbas
entry.content: Russia’s invading army shelled the positions of Ukrainian defenders along the front line as both sides girded for the next battles for control of Ukraine’s east.

entry.title: Russia's Tactical Shift in Ukraine Raises Prospect of Protracted War
entry.content: After early missteps, Moscow has found tactics that are working and is making steady advances in eastern Ukraine, setting the stage for a war of attrition in which Kyiv needs more Western weapons and help training new soldiers to turn the tide.
